Wasted literally a decade of my life playing a game that only got worse over time. It has the worst anti-cheat system I've ever seen and the rank systems make no sense in terms of how you rank up or down. Multiple times recently I'll queue for popular maps during populated hours and as a silver play against global elites, LE's, and MG's. I used to love this game now it just pisses me off more and more every time I play it.
tragiczna jest ta gra nie ma antycheata nic
The epitome of fair and square, competitive gaming experience. Good game.

I simply don't like the reworkings of the game, but...

This game implements "spray patterns" which is basically recoil plus a defined pattern of accuracy.
5 vs 5 competitive games makes for a real chance of a career considering its one of the main ESL titles and the crowd following is one of the largest.
Campaign offers a chance to level up and earn rewards/weapon skins.
purchase's include keys for crates, glove skins, weapon skins and character skins. there is also medals you can acquire.
If I've left anything out comments can supply.
cheers and happy gaming.
